entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Dawson Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, -9.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Dawson Creek Airport 7:00 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: -9.9°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: -11.1°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Fog becoming fog patches in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Fog. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches becoming fog in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
